alert.note: Alert for Coke (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 5:56PM CDT until May 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Coke County in west central Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 556 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Robert Lee, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Robert Lee around 625 PM CDT. Bronte around 640 PM CDT. Blackwell and Fort Chadbourne around 700 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Oak Creek Reservoir and The Intersection Of Highway 208 And Ranch Road 2662. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
